text: Baluna, ‘ke asamanasamuha o yaminera raba?’ Baluna, ‘allah‌.’ [1] Baluna, ‘tabe ki tomara abhibhabakarupe grahana karecha allahara paribarte an'yake yara nijedera labha ba ksati sadhane saksama naya?’ Baluna, ‘andha [2] o caksusmana ki samana hate pare? Naki andhakara o alo [3] samana hate pare?’ Tabe ki tara allah‌ra emana sarika srsti kareche, yara allahara srstira mata srsti kareche, ye karane srsti tadera kache sadrsa mane hayeche [4]? Baluna, ‘allah sakala bastura srasta [5]; ara tini eka, maha pratapasali [6].’
